SELECT PO_NO, PO_CODE, CLT_CODE, EMP_NO, MTL_CODE, MTL_RCV_QTY, MTL_RCV_PRICE, MTL_RCV_DATE, PO_DATE, PO_QTY, QTY_UNIT,
PO_STATUS, PO_USE_YN FROM PURCHASES_ORDER p WHERE NOT EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT m WHERE m.PO_CODE = p.PO_CODE ) ORDER BY PO_DATE DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MATERIAL_RECEIPT ( RECEIPT_NO, RECEIPT_CODE, PO_CODE, MTL_CODE, RECEIVED_QTY, RECEIPT_DATE, RECEIPT_STATUS, WAREHOUSE_CODE, LOCATION_CODE, RECEIVER, CREATED_BY, UPDATED_BY, CREATED_DATE, UPDATED_DATE ) VALUES ( SEQ_MATERIAL_RECEIPT.NEXTVAL, #{receiptCode}, #{poCode}, #{mtlCode}, #{receivedQty}, #{receiptDate, jdbcType=DATE}, #{receiptStatus}, #{warehouseCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locationCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{receiver}, #{createdBy}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdDate}, #{updatedDate} )
mapper.select:
SELECT MR.RECEIPT_NO, MR.RECEIPT_CODE, MR.PO_CODE, MR.MTL_CODE, MR.RECEIVED_QTY, M.MTL_NAME, MR.RECEIPT_DATE, MR.RECEIPT_STATUS, MR.WAREHOUSE_CODE, MR.LOCATION_CODE, MR.RECEIVER, MR.CREATED_BY, MR.UPDATED_BY, MR.CREATED_DATE, MR.UPDATED_DATE FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT MR LEFT JOIN MATERIALS M ON MR.MTL_CODE = M.MTL_CODE
( MR.RECEIPT_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR MR.PO_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR MR.MTL_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR M.MTL_NAME LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%' OR )
ORDER BY MR.RECEIPT_NO DESC

SELECT MR.RECEIPT_NO, MR.RECEIPT_CODE, MR.PO_CODE, MR.MTL_CODE, M.MTL_NAME, MR.RECEIVED_QTY, MR.RECEIPT_DATE, MR.RECEIPT_STATUS, MR.WAREHOUSE_CODE, MR.LOCATION_CODE, MR.RECEIVER, MR.CREATED_BY, MR.UPDATED_BY, MR.CREATED_DATE, MR.UPDATED_DATE, PO.PO_DATE, PO.CLT_CODE FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT MR LEFT JOIN MATERIALS M ON MR.MTL_CODE = M.MTL_CODE LEFT JOIN PURCHASES_ORDER PO ON MR.PO_CODE = PO.PO_CODE WHERE MR.RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}

SELECT IQ.IQC_NO AS INSP_NO, IQ.RECEIPT_NO, IQ.IQC_START_TIME AS INSP_DATE, IQ.RECEIVED_QTY AS INSP_QTY, IQ.RECEIVED_QTY AS PASS_QTY, IQ.RECEIVED_QTY AS FAIL_QTY, IQ.EMP_NAME AS INSPECTOR, IQ.IQC_INSPECTION_RESULT AS INSP_RESULT FROM IQC IQ WHERE IQ.RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}
SELECT L.LOT_NO, L.LOT_QTY, L.LOT_DATE, L.LOT_STATUS FROM MATERIAL_LOT L WHERE L.RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}

SELECT W.WAREHOUSE_CODE, W.WHS_NAME AS WAREHOUSE_NAME, L.LOCATION_CODE, L.LOCATION_NAME, L.STOCK_QTY FROM MATERIAL_STOCK_LOCATION L JOIN WAREHOUSE W ON L.WAREHOUSE_CODE = W.WAREHOUSE_CODE WHERE L.RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}
SELECT H.HISTORY_NO, H.RECEIPT_NO, H.ACTION_TYPE, H.ACTION_DESCRIPTION, H.ACTION_USER, H.ACTION_DATE FROM MATERIAL_RECEIPT_HISTORY H WHERE H.RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo} ORDER BY H.ACTION_DATE DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE MATERIAL_RECEIPT SET RECEIPT_STATUS = #{receiptStatus}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}
UPDATE MATERIAL_RECEIPT SET RECEIPT_STATUS = #{receiptStatus}, RECEIPT_DATE = TO_DATE(#{receiptDate}, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}

UPDATE MATERIAL_RECEIPT SET RECEIPT_STATUS = #{receiptStatus}, WAREHOUSE_CODE = #{warehouseCode}, LOCATION_CODE = #{locationCode}, UPDATED_BY = #{updatedBy}, UPDATED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE RECEIPT_NO = #{receiptNo}
